Player History
Released by Boston on 3/2/2002...
Signed as a free agent by Arizona on 3/2/2002 to a minor league deal...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/4/2003, off Bobby Chouinard (SFN)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/7/2003, off Livan Hernandez (SDN)...
Injured on 7/3/2003 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 8/22/2003 with a Hyper Extended Knee, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Pittsburgh on 8/23/2004...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/23/2006, hitting .389 with 5 HR, 12 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/2006, hitting .329 with 8 HR, 25 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Chicago (N) on 7/31/2008...
Drove in 6 runs against Atlanta on 4/28/2010...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/23/2011, hitting .560 with 1 HR, 5 RBI...
Was selected to the 2011 Allstar game...
Hit 3 homeruns against Montreal, driving in 6 runs on 8/17/2013...
Was selected to the 2015 Allstar game...
Had 2000th career hit on 9/13/2015, off Joel Pineiro (CHW)...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Anaheim on 4/25/2016...
Was selected to the 2017 Allstar game...
Injured on 8/19/2017 with a Sore Back, out for one week...
Injured on 8/13/2018 with a Strained Abdominal Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 5/6/2019 with a Fractured Hand, out for 4-5 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by New York (A) on 4/1/2020 to a 1-year deal worth $2,000,000 per year...
Traded from New York (A) to Florida on 5/16/2020 (Going to FLA: P R. Mcgreevy, 3B A. Gonzalez. Going to NYY: CF A. Young, P H. Rodrigues)...
Traded from Florida to San Francisco on 7/16/2020 (Going to SF: 3B A. Gonzalez, RF H. Edgar, P D. Vanwingerden, 3B T. Goeddel. Going to FLA: 1B P. Goldschmidt)...
Drafted in 3rd round, 60th overall pick, by New York (A) in 1977...
Injured on 8/19/1981 with a Torn Abdominal Muscle, out for full season...
